lines.text: The devil was a rebel angel. If you want to fuck with the living, you'll have to learn to fuck with the dead!
I want to break your heart.

[just found out John Stone is a cop]
HEY COP! Let's dance.
This is either gonna be the biggest pork chop I ever ate, or my bulldozer.
Imagine the future, Chains, 'cause you're not in it.
You look like a grown-up version of Bam-Bam.
You gonna use that stick, or you wanna dance with me?
It's better to be first in Hell than last in Heaven!

[showing his "colors" to Stone]
This may be a rag to the walking dead out there, but *this* is my flag, my cross, my church. And these colors don't run... If they hit the ground even in a fight, I will peel your skin off with a knife dipped in shit.
You've logged more biker-related arrests than any other officer in Alabama.
[after beating up three would-be grocery store robbers]
You better clean up on aisle four.
